title: Douglas Baby Stanley Sloth Teether Plush Stuffed Animal
features: This appealing Teether features our playful Silly Little Sloth character lovingly crafted in soft, cuddly plush materials. Embroidered facial features and a leaf accent make this machine washable soft toy safe for infants.
The pastel green teether ring is made of soft and safe 100% silicone to soothe away Baby's teething pains. Gingham patterned fabric and little knotted feet add a touch of whimsy.
Designed in Keene, New Hampshire, U.S.A. by Douglas Cuddle Toys, makers of endearing soft toys for over 60 years.
Safe for all ages birth and up, machine washable.
description: The friendly face of our friendly Stanley the Sloth Teether and its safe 100% silicone teething ring are just what Baby needs for those difficult teething days! Stanley's happy expression and cozy tan materials come together for a sophisticated infant soft toy. We use only the finest luxury fabrics and designs crafted to please and soothe Baby. Additional details include charming embroidered embellishments on the face, paws, and belly. Little knotted feet complete his look. Enjoy this Stanley the Sloth Teether on its own or consider matching it with other soft accessories from our Baby Sloth collection.
